pkgmetadata.longdescription: Probabilistic Verbal Autopsy Coding with InSilicoVA // Computes individual causes of death and population cause-specific mortality fractions using the 'InSilicoVA' algorithm. It uses data derived from verbal autopsy (VA) interviews, in a format similar to the input of the widely used 'InterVA4' method. This package provides general model fitting and customization for 'InSilicoVA' algorithm and basic graphical visualization of the output.
